issue.title: Inconsistent hotkeys for snapping to grid

content.raw:
Reviving this so that I can make an accurate Hot Key Ref Chart. I'm inclined to, by default, have models move freely, and snap with the use of a hot key. This would mean that we change the Inserting behavior such that, if no hot key is pressed, the model *does not* snap. 

Thoughts?
content.html:
Reviving this so that I can make an accurate Hot Key Ref Chart. I'm inclined to, by default, have models move freely, and snap with the use of a hot key. This would mean that we change the Inserting behavior such that, if no hot key is pressed, the model does not snap.

Thoughts?
